input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Custom Photo Engraved Bracelet"
Reference Product Description:
This beautiful bracelet allows for a adjustable size - to fit all wrists!
Held together by a rounded box chain, with a round photo charm attached at the center.
This new stylish bracelet is perfect for any gift or occasion.
All photos are 100% lifetime guaranteed.
Item can be engraved with message, names, dates or monogram.
Engraving doesn't delay your shipment.
Picture Engraving is scratch and water resistant and included in the price.
One Size Fits All

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Custom Photo Projection Rope Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Engraved Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Projection Curb Chain Bracelet'
  - Name='925 Sterling Silver Projection Pet Photo Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Projection Photo Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Men's Silicone Strap Bracelet'
  - Name='PERIMADE Minimalist Double Photo Projection Bangle Bracelet'
  - Name='Things Remembered Men's ID Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Projection Braided Rope Bracelet'
  - Name='PicturesOnGold.com Expandable Engraved Charm Photo Bracelet with picture'
  - Name='Personalized Leather Bracelet with Hidden Message'
  - Name='Diamond Initial Bar Bracelet'
  - Name='Bolo Heart Bracelet with Diamond Accent'
  - Name='Engraved Linked Bracelet'
  - Name='10K Yellow Gold Hand Bracelet'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a custom photo bracelet with projection function and rope style, similar personalized function but different chain style.
Identical product name and likely identical features focusing on custom photo engraving on a bracelet.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Projection Curb Chain Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom photo bracelet with projection and curb chain, similar function and chain construction with slight style difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 925 Sterling Silver Projection Pet Photo Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom photo projection bracelet in sterling silver focused on pet photos, similar personalized engraved photo bracelet function.
Personalized photo projection bracelet, closely aligned in function and customization to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Men's Silicone Strap Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom photo bracelet but with a silicone strap aimed at men, differs in material and style from metal chain bracelet.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PERIMADE Minimalist Double Photo Projection Bangle Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo projection bracelet with bangle silhouette rather than chain, more minimalistic but similar photo personalization focus.
Menâ€™s ID bracelet likely personalized but no explicit photo engraving or projection, different style and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Projection Braided Rope Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom photo projection on braided rope bracelet, similar photo personalization and type of bracelet with different material style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PicturesOnGold.com Expandable Engraved Charm Photo Bracelet with picture
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and nearly identical product description emphasizing engraved photo charm bracelet, very high relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Leather Bracelet with Hidden Message
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Leather bracelet with hidden message personalization, no photo engraving, different material and personalization method.
Jewelry bracelet with diamond and initial bar, neither photo nor engraving, different main function and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bolo Heart Bracelet with Diamond Accent
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Decorative heart-shaped bolo bracelet with diamonds, no photo personalization or engraving, different product category.
Engraved bracelet similar in personalized engraving aspect but lacks specific photo customization and no mention of adjustable size or photo charm.
Gold hand-shaped bracelet, likely decorative with no photo engraving or personalized function, different style and purpose.
